octojam1title.title: Octojam 1 Title
octojam1title.desc: Greeting program for the Octo-ber 2014 Chip8 Game Jam.

octojam2title.title: Octojam 2 Title
octojam2title.desc: This title card draws a nearly full screen 64x30 animation with very low flicker.

octojam3title.title: Octojam 3 Title
octojam3title.desc: This title card disambiguates at runtime between a COSMAC VIP, SCHIP, and Octo.

octojam4title.title: Octojam 4 Title
octojam4title.desc: This title card demonstrates the new :macro and :calc directives.

octojam5title.title: Octojam 5 Title
octojam5title.desc: Greeting program for the fifth annual 2018 Octojam.

octojam6title.title: Octojam 6 Title
octojam6title.desc: Greeting program for the sixth annual 2019 Octojam.

octojam7title.title: Octojam 7 Title
octojam7title.desc: Greeting program for the seventh annual 2020 Octojam.

octojam8title.title: Octojam 8 Title
octojam8title.desc: Greeting program for the eighth annual 2021 Octojam.

octojam9title.title: Octojam 9 Title
octojam9title.desc: Greetings program for the ninth annual 2022 Octojam.

garlicscape.title: Into The GarlicScape
garlicscape.desc: Collect aliums, avoid moths, pet llamas. A template program for Octojam 7.

superneatboy.title: Super NeatBoy
superneatboy.desc: Jump, fall, tidy up leaves. A template program for Octojam 7.

fuse.title: Fuse
fuse.desc: A minimalist reinterpretation of the classic Pipe Dream.

blackrainbow.title: Black Rainbow
blackrainbow.desc: Plumb the depths of your subconscious and bring back the motherlode...

slipperyslope.title: Slippery Slope
slipperyslope.desc: The ice we skate is getting pretty thin. The water's getting warm so you might as well swim.

chipwar.title: ChipWar
chipwar.desc: A (loose) adaptation of the classic DiceWars.

caveexplorer.title: Cave Explorer
caveexplorer.desc: Do you have what it takes to be a Cave Explorer?

sweetcopter.title: Sw8 Copter
sweetcopter.desc: An adaptation of "Swing Copters" for the Super Chip8.

wonkypong.title: Wonky Pong
wonkypong.desc: Pong, but wonky. Made for Octojam IV.

gradsim.title: Grad School Simulator 2014
gradsim.desc: Welcome to the sunless depths of my ennui.

mondrian.title: Mondri8
mondrian.desc: Draw random compositions in the style of Piet Mondrian.

outlaw.title: Outlaw
outlaw.desc: An adaptation of the Atari 2600 game "Outlaw" for the Chip8.

RPS.title: RPS
RPS.desc: Classic "Rock Paper Scissors" game for the Chip8.

octoachip8story.title: Octo: a Chip 8 Story
octoachip8story.desc: A visual novel game for the Chip8.

pumpkindressup.title: Pumpkin "Dreess" Up
pumpkindressup.desc: Classic Adobe Flash games, now in Chip8.

8ceattourny_d1.title: 8CE Attourny - Disc 1
8ceattourny_d1.desc: Exciting court battles in Chip8! Disc 1/3 of an exciting multi-tape game.

8ceattourny_d2.title: 8CE Attourny - Disc 2
8ceattourny_d2.desc: Exciting court battles in Chip8! Disc 2/3 of an exciting multi-tape game.

8ceattourny_d3.title: 8CE Attourny - Disc 3
8ceattourny_d3.desc: Exciting court battles in Chip8! Disc 3/3 of an exciting multi-tape game.

DVN8.title: DVN8
DVN8.desc: This is your great-grandma's dungeon crawler. You can see it with the manual at https://systemlogoff.com/share/DVN8/index.html

octorancher.title: Octo Rancher
octorancher.desc: Train monsters and become a real ranching champion. Read the manual at https://systemlogoff.com/share/Octo-Rancher-Manual.pdf

rockto.title: Rockto
rockto.desc: An adaptation of "Boulder Dash" for the Chip8.

flightrunner.title: Flight Runner
flightrunner.desc: A simple flight runner for the Chip8.

masquer8.title: Masquer8
masquer8.desc: Cuttlefish pattern matching game for chip8.

carbon8.title: Carbon8
carbon8.desc: A period correct movie tie in game for a popular 1980s franchise.

BadKaiJuJu.title: Bad Kaiju Ju
BadKaiJuJu.desc: The year is 1977. 90% of the world's landmass is now underwater and the world is at war...

piper.title: Piper
piper.desc: Play as a small bird to collect goodies and avoid waves.

civiliz8n.title: Civiliz8n
civiliz8n.desc: Grow a tiny civilization in 10 turns

skyward.title: Skyward
skyward.desc: Climb as high as you can!

anEveningToDieFor.title: An Evening to Die For
anEveningToDieFor.desc: It is a dark and stormy night. A murder has been committed...

horseyJump.title: Horsey Jump
horseyJump.desc: Press the X button to make the horse jump over the fence.

superOctoTrackXO.title: Super Octo Track XO
superOctoTrackXO.desc: Compose songs with the XO-Chip audio system.

ghostEscape.title: Ghost Escape
ghostEscape.desc: Seek revenge on mortal men in this exciting adventure!

tombstontipp.title: TOMB STON TIPP
tombstontipp.desc: Take turns pressing buttons to see who wins.

flutterby.title: Flutter By
flutterby.desc: A game where you are a butterfly trying to get to flowers.

br8kout.title: Br8kout
br8kout.desc: You can't even imagine how amazing this breakout clone is!

keshaWasBiird.title: Kesha Was Biird
keshaWasBiird.desc: Second installment in epic saga about Kesha.

keshaWasNiiinja.title: Kesha Was Niiinja
keshaWasNiiinja.desc: Legendary ninja returns! Who is he? Ruthless killer? Absolute evil? Character with his own purpose? His motives are still unclear, and his story is for you to unfold.

sk8.title: SK8 H8 1988
sk8.desc: Don't get trashed out there, GRRL!

spacejam.title: Spacejam!
spacejam.desc: An extended and enhanced version loosely based on ShipTunnel from the 2014 OctoJam.

mastermind.title: Mastermind
mastermind.desc: The classic puzzle game of deduction.

spaceracer.title: Space Racer
spaceracer.desc: Based on the classic 2-player 'Space Race' video game.

down8.title: down8
down8.desc: you fall down an endless hole and then you die!

trucksimul8or.title: Truck Simul8or
trucksimul8or.desc: You're a kid, you're a truck.

danm8ku.title: Danm8ku
danm8ku.desc: Bullet hell for the Chip-8! Survive 8 waves of exciting bullet patterns!

binding.title: The Binding of COSMAC
binding.desc: Simplified Isaac demake for SCHIP. 42 screens across three floors with an exciting boss battle at the end!

chipcross.title: Chipcross
chipcross.desc: 16 levels of Picross implemented in CHIP8. 800 bytes of fun.

knight.title: Knight
knight.desc: You're Artore the Puny, littlebrother and inferior to your great big brother, King Arthur.

glitchGhost.title: Glitch Ghost
glitchGhost.desc: glitch ghost is all alone in the cemetery, please help them make some friends by turning the trespassing humans into new ghosts!

octovore.title: Octovore
octovore.desc: a game of hungry hungry octopods

nokiatemplate.title: Nokia 3310 Template
nokiatemplate.desc: SCHIP template program for resembling the Nokia 3310

expedition.title: Expedition.
expedition.desc: A short narrative about going outside.

OctoPartyMix.title: Octo Party Mix!
OctoPartyMix.desc: It's basically Warioware. But with cute octo buddies!

applejak.title: Applejak
applejak.desc: Interpreter for a subset of APL/K.

bulb.title: Bulb
bulb.desc: Interpreter for a language which resembles toenail clippings.

octogon.title: Super Octogon
octogon.desc: Eight fantastic sides, and eight awesome angles.

ordinaryidlegarden.title: Ordinary Idle Garden
ordinaryidlegarden.desc: Grow a tiny garden filled with dandelions, pumpkins... lanturns... skeletons?

octoma.title: Octoma
octoma.desc: A simplified clone of Ultima. Go forth and save the Octo Princess!
